name: Kamikaze Mutant Explosion
description:
**This was a created over two days in  Game Jam **

Waves of mutants are attacking! What're you going to do? Probably shoot them? Good. That's how you survive this cruel world. One gun, a handful of grenades and shear reflexes, that's how! Good luck out there and watch out for those Kamikaze Mutant Explosion's.
